summary: A struggling writer, Ray Wyatt, acquires fame in an unusual way when a notorious serial murderer, named the Karaoke Killer, steals his car and the newest draft of his script.
cast: Daniel Raymont|Krysten Ritter|Darrell Hammond|Reiko Aylesworth|Mike Starr|Larry Hankin|Raul Aranas|Christine Danelson|Asher Grodman|Judith Kahan|Peter Karinen|Richard Kind|Lance Kinsey|Andrea Martin|Jenna Rae Montgomery|Wade Mylius|Audrie Neenan|Rose Pasquale|Brian Sacca|Galeit Sehayek|Pamela Shaw|Ptolemy Slocum|Elizabeth Taufield|Martin Short
keywords: pervert|closeted homosexual|gay|dumping a dead body|struggling writer
title: BuzzKill
